metadata.synopsis: Cockney boys catch crooks by cracking their code in a serial story.

reviews: Sure to be enjoyed by those who grew up reading the likes of The Hardy Boys, Alfred Hitchcock and the Three Investigators, and (over yonder in Europe) The Famous Five.
a classic that stands alone, a London landmark with laughs that takes us back to a more rough and tumble time, and does it with a style that would be admired and copied for generations to come
...the movie never goes too long without giving you something shiny to look at.
This is quite definitely a film out of the ordinary. The story is well constructed, the continuity good and the interest sustained.
